item.description:
Movie time again and we are back to Framingham for a showing of "Knowing".

Synopsis:

A teacher opens a time capsule that has been dug up at his son's elementary school; in it are some chilling predictions -- some that have already occurred and others that are about to -- that lead him to believe his family plays a role in the events that are about to unfold.

Join us for a showing of this thriller staring Nicolas Cage.

We will be attending the 1:35 showing so lets meet at 1:00.

I will also be listing a separate Munchies event on this day. We will go there after the show for a late lunch\early dinner. If you plan on attending both events please sign up for both so I can make the reservations at the place for lunch.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lobby of the theater.
item.name: We will all be "Knowing" after this Sunday afternoon at the movies!
